main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified circular disc-shaped objects were reported near Mildenhall, England during October 1957.
interesting points: One object was described as silent, stationary, grey in color, with portholes, and was observed for 20 minutes., Another object, about 30 feet in diameter, was observed at Ipswich on 6 Oct 57, disappeared rapidly after about 20 seconds., Air Force pilots reported a bright silver, disc-shaped object that emitted no exhaust, observed for 10 to 15 minutes., Objects were seen under good weather conditions and no other aircraft were in the area during sightings., Multiple reports suggested that objects did not leave any evidence of propulsion.
witness description: United States Air Force pilots and local residents
